Package application.view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    adminController
    The controller responsible for the admin stage, adding and deleting users
    AlbumsController
    Controller responsible for the stage where albums are selected for editing, renamed, or deleted
    FileDropDown_Util
    Takes care of safe exiting via file mene, as well as redirecting to search or safely logging out.
    LoginController
    Controller responsible for the login stage, checking username and passwords and redirecting once credentials are confirmed
    newAlbumController
    Controller responsible for reading in the name of a new album and creating it.
    PicturesController
    This is the controller responsible for administrating an album view: updating image photo details, copying, moving, deleting, and adding photos
    renameController
    Helper class to receive 'enter' keystroke to save the rename of an album
    SceneLoader
    Helper class to change the stage to a different scene.
    searchController
    Controller responsible for searching a user's photos.
    SlideShowController
    Controller responsible for showing the slideshow starting with the photo last selected in the album administration stage
